welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leawood, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and executive flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private terminal at Downtown Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at New Century Aircenter Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansas City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansas City International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Kansas City International Airport, primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds or data usage.
